name: Jet Penguin Prototype
description:
Jet Penguin is a platformer shooter about a penguin with a jetpack!

Default controls:

KeyboardPlayStationXboxActionArrow Keys
D-PadD-PadMove, aim gun, aim jetpack, navigate menu
Z
XAJump, single jetpack thrust, select
XSquareXShoot
CR2RTHold jetpack thrust
A/D
L1/R1LB/RBCycle through guns
EscapeStart/OptionStartPauseF2Restart game

This is a project I've been working on since late last year, but due to some personal issues with the direction, it's currently on hold indefinitely. I decided to upload this demo to see what people think of it in its current state, but if I do continue on this game, it'll likely be a very different take.

If you try this demo, please comment any thoughts you have! Constructive feedback is the best way for a project like this to be as good as it can be ^-^
